Interface ChatInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandInterface

    public interface ChatInterface
    This defines how an interface for the chat program should function.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.BufferedReader getInput()
      The stream to read user input from.
      java.io.PrintWriter getOutput()
      The stream to send output to the user.
      java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionRequest> getPendingConnections()
      Connection requests from other clients
      boolean requestConnection(java.lang.String connectionName)
      Request the user to accept a connection.

    • Method Detail

      • requestConnection

        boolean requestConnection(java.lang.String connectionName)
        Request the user to accept a connection. This method should block the calling thread until the user either confirms or denies the request.
        Parameters:
        connectionName - The identifier for the connection
        Returns:
        true is the user accepts the connection, false otherwise

      • getInput

        java.io.BufferedReader getInput()
        The stream to read user input from.
        Returns:
        The BufferedReader the user input comes on

      • getOutput

        java.io.PrintWriter getOutput()
        The stream to send output to the user.
        Returns:
        The PrintWriter to send the user output

      • getPendingConnections

        java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionRequest> getPendingConnections()
        Connection requests from other clients
        Returns:
        ArrayList of connectionRequest objects that represent current pending connections
